name: Split Decision (RaccoonNursery)
description:
Ever wonder what goes on inside your head? Side with your angels or demons to pick a moral outcome!

Play by rolling your heart around with WASD, arrows or left joystick. 

Push the angels or the demons out, and discover the consequences of your actions!

CREDITS:

  • 3D Art: Niccolò Temperanza, Stephen Nevin
  • Character Design: Camilla Ciccotti
  • Music & Sound Design: Stephanie Taylor
  • Animation: Maria Robertson
  • Game Programming: Tim Kaufmann, Tim Ogunmakin
  • UI/UX Design & Programming: Inès Robin

Made within 48h for the Global Game Jam 2022
